meanings.definition: The action of explaining the meaning of something
meanings.sent1: Her interpretations of the story were always insightful.
meanings.sent2: There are many interpretations of the painting in the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: His interpretations of the math problem made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The interpretations of the ancient text shed light on its mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The interpretations of the song lyrics made the audience emotional.

meanings.definition: A particular way of performing or understanding something
meanings.sent1: The dancer's interpretations of the choreography were unique.
meanings.sent2: Different cultures have diverse interpretations of beauty.
meanings.sent3: His interpretations of the recipe led to a delicious disaster.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's interpretations of the game strategy were brilliant.
meanings.sent5: The interpretations of the play brought a new perspective to the audience.
